body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Daniel Ruark and Charity Ruark. Married to Catharine Ruark. Father of Thomas Ruark and Henry Ruark. Served in Co. A, 45th Reg. Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Private from July 6, 1863. Farmer in Lewis County, Kentucky in 1863.
